## Website Information
- **Name**: [Website name]
- **URL**: [https://example.com]
- **Type**: [e.g., movie database, torrenting, social media]

## Request Type
- [ ] New UserScript (functionality enhancement)
- [ ] New UserStyle (visual theme)

## Description
What would you like to see added for this website?

## Motivation
Why would this be useful? What problems does it solve?

## Design/Theme Preferences (for UserStyles)
- [ ] Catppuccin theme (preferred)
- [ ] Dark mode
- [ ] Light mode
- [ ] Other: _____________

## Features (for UserScripts)
What specific features or improvements would you like?

## Examples
Links to similar scripts/styles for other sites, if applicable.

## Site Complexity
- [ ] Simple (mostly static content)
- [ ] Medium (some dynamic content)
- [ ] Complex (heavily dynamic, SPA)

## Willingness to Contribute
- [ ] I can help with development
- [ ] I can help with testing
- [ ] I can provide screenshots/examples
- [ ] I can only provide feedback

## Additional Information
Any other relevant information about the site or your request.
